input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following item features and item title information.

Item title:
iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets Shooter Targets for Shooting Range Target

Item features:
Thermal Targets
Made In USA
13x19 Size
Thick Paper Targets
iCandy Combat Design
input_text.Response A:
Hi there! 👋 I'm so happy to help you with your question! 😊

So, you're looking for a super cool and fun product to use at the shooting range, right? 🎯 Well, you're in luck because I have just the thing for you! 🍀

Introducing the iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets! 🔥 These targets are made in the USA, and they're made of thick paper, so they're really durable and can withstand lots of shooting practice. 💪

The best part? They have a cool iCandy Combat design, so you'll look like a total boss when you're shooting at them! 😎 And, they're the perfect size - 13x19 inches, so you can get lots of shooting practice in. 💥

So, what do you say? Are you ready to try out these awesome thermal targets and become a shooting master? 🏹 Let me know if you have any other questions, and I'll do my best to help! 😊
input_text.Response B: iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets are the perfect way to have fun while improving your accuracy. These 13x19-inch targets are made from thick paper and feature a unique iCandy Combat design. They are perfect for use at the shooting range and are available in a pack of 25. The thermal targets make it easy to see your shots, so you can adjust your aim and improve your skills. Made in the USA.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
